fields.name: Primary enrolment data available at last cutoff (GEM Report (2017/18))
fields.description: Binary variable describing whether primary enrolment data, specifically total enrolment in primary education for the year ending 2015, was available in the SDG 4 monitoring tables (Global Monitoring Report 2018).

fields.name: Existence of nationally representative learning assessment in grades 2 or 3 of primary education (GEM Report (2017/18))
fields.description: Binary variable denoting whether there is a nationally representative learning assessment in grades 2 or 3 of primary education, as per most recent survey in the period 2010-2015.   'Nationally representative learning assessment' refers to national, regional and international formative low-stake learning assessments. It is important to bear in mind that different types of assessments are not necessarily comparable.

fields.name: Existence of nationally representative learning assessment at the end of primary education (GEM Report (2017/18))
fields.description: Binary variable denoting whether there is a nationally representative learning assessment at the end of primary education, as per most recent survey in the period 2010-2015. 'Nationally representative learning assessment' refers to national, regional and international formative low-stake learning assessments. It is important to bear in mind that different types of assessments are not necessarily comparable.
